name: Muti (Canceled)
blurb: Muti is a first-person horror experience. A terrifying journey into the darkest magics of the dark continent: Africa.

rewards.reward: Fear Edition:\r\n\r\nOur deepest thanks and 3 of our exclusive Kickstarter high resolution Muti wallpapers.
Courage Edition:\r\n\r\nLots of thanks! And 6 Kickstater exclusive high resolution Muti wallpapers.

Torch Bearer Edition:

You get the Game! 
Receive digital copy of the game, downloadable on launch, and 6 of our Kickstarter exclusive high resolution Muti wallpapers.

Art Investigator Edition: \r\n\r\nReceive digital copy of the game, downloadable on launch, and 6 of our Kickstarter exclusive high resolution Muti wallpapers. Additionally a copy of the exclusive Muti art book in PDF format. You get to know our artists!

Story Investigator Edition:\r\n\r\nReceive digital copy of the game, downloadable on launch, and 6 of our Kickstarter exclusive high resolution Muti wallpapers. Additionally receive the Muti Novel with the added bonus of character bios and the inspirations behind the story, in PDF format.

The Case closed Edition:\r\n\r\nReceive digital copy of the game, downloadable on launch, and 6 of our Kickstarter exclusive high resolution Muti wallpapers with the added edition of a copy of the exclusive Muti art book in PDF format. You get to know our artists! And receive the Muti Novel with the added bonus of character bios and the inspirations behind the story, in PDF format.
Believer Edition:\r\n\r\nReceive everything from the Case closed Edition but with an added second digital copy of the game, downloadable on launch.

Ritual Edition:\r\n\r\nGet two physical postcards, sent off after launch and receive the digital copy of the game, downloadable on launch. 6 of our Kickstarter exclusive high resolution Muti wallpapers with the added edition of a copy of the exclusive Muti art book in PDF format. Also receive the Muti Novel with the added bonus of character bios and the inspirations behind the story, in PDF format.

The Truth -Seeker Edition: \r\n\r\nThe first tier where you receive the boxed version of the Muti game with the added opportunity to vote for your favorite of the two additional characters you would like to see first as the next character. On top of that get two physical postcards, sent off after launch and receive the digital copy of the game, downloadable on launch. 6 of our Kickstarter exclusive high resolution Muti wallpapers with the added edition of a copy of the exclusive Muti art book in PDF format. Also receive the Muti Novel with the added bonus of character bios and the inspirations behind the story, in PDF format.

Scarifical Edition:\r\n\r\nYou get to wear our t-shirt! and show everyone your belief! Receive the digital version of the game, the novel and the art book, with 6 wallpapers, an exclusive Muti t-shirt and the chance to vote for the character you want to see next.

Tribal Edition:\r\n\r\nReceive the boxed version of the Muti game with the added opportunity to vote for favorite of the two additional characters you would like to see first as the next character. On top of that get two physical postcards, sent off after launch and receive the digital copy of the game, downloadable on launch, and 6 of our Kickstarter exclusive high resolution Muti wallpapers with the added edition of a copy of the exclusive Muti art book in PDF format. You get to know our artists! And receive the Muti Novel with the added bonus of character bios and the inspirations behind the story, in PDF format. Additionally you get an exclusive Muti t-shirt and the chance to vote for the character you want to see next.
Bone thrower Edition:\r\n\r\nPrepare for everything you would receive from the Tribal Edition with an additional digital version of the game and an exclusive Muti physical soft cover novel.

Bone Reader Edition:\r\n\r\nReceive the boxed version of the Muti game with the added opportunity to vote for your favorite which one of the two additional characters you would like to see first as the next character. On top of that get two physical postcards, sent off after launch and receive two digital copies of the game, downloadable on launch, and 6 of our Kickstarter exclusive high resolution Muti wallpapers with the added edition of a copy of the physical exclusive Muti art book. You get to know our artists!

Bone collector Edition:\r\n\r\nPrepare for everything you would receive from the Tribal Edition with an additional digital version of the game the exclusive hard cover Muti art book and soft cover Muti novel.

Body Collector Edition:\r\n\r\nThe Body Collector is the first signed edition reward. Receive everything from the Bone Collector edition with signed copies of the boxed game, the soft cover Muti novel and the hard cover Muti art book and get your name proudly etched into the cold chambers in the morgue or on the walls of our in-game South Africa.

Dark Ceremonial Edition:\r\n\r\nReceive a print of your choice (from the options provided) of one of the exclusively painted artworks from our African artist of scenes from the game as an added bonus to this tier. On top of that receive everything in the Body Collector Edition.

Cradle of life Edition:\r\n\r\ncrammed with everything from the tier above with the additional bonus of receiving your own customized drawn African mask, with a short description added to explain the psychology behind it AND your name printed on the back of the t-shirt as a Muti supporter.

Ancestry Edition:\r\n\r\nThis is our highest tier it carries everything every tier has had to offer up to now, including a print of your choice from the selected original art, a digitally drawn mask and now with the added feature of having your mask built in game for Zola to find and collect. Etched on the back, your name and a customized thanks from the whole Muti team.
